mapper.select: select resource_name as resourceName, resource_id as resourceId, media_type from tpl_mv_resource_t where tmdb_id is null and refresh_id != #{refreshId} LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{pageSize};
mapper.insert: insert into tpl_mv_resource_t (resource_id, resource_name, resource_path, media_type, refresh_id, resource_info, setting_id) values (#{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{fileType}, #{refreshId}, #{fileInfo}, #{settingId})
mapper.select: select tmdb_id as tmdbId from tpl_mv_tmdb_info_t where tmdb_id = #{tmdbId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tpl_mv_tmdb_info_t ( tmdb_id, LANGUAGE, is_confirm, title, resource_data, release_date, production_countries, genres, include_adult, media_type ) VALUES ( #{tmdbId}, #{language}, #{isConfirm}, #{title}, #{resourceData}, #{release_date}, #{production_countries}, #{genres}, #{include_adult}, #{media_type} );
